org.onehippo.forge.exdocpicker.api

Interface ExternalDocumentDisplayService<T extends Serializable>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Domain specific external document POJO type which must be serializable.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ExternalDocumentServiceFacade<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServiceDelegatingExternalDocumentServiceFacade

    public interface ExternalDocumentDisplayService<T extends Serializable>
    The implementation of this interface is responsible for reading title, description and icon link from the domain specific external document object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getDocumentDescription(ExternalDocumentServiceContext context, T doc, Locale preferredLocale)
      Reads the description from the domain specific external document object by the preferredLocale.
      String getDocumentIconLink(ExternalDocumentServiceContext context, T doc, Locale preferredLocale)
      Reads the icon link URL from the domain specific external document object by the preferredLocale.
      String getDocumentTitle(ExternalDocumentServiceContext context, T doc, Locale preferredLocale)
      Reads the title from the domain specific external document object by the preferredLocale.
      default boolean isDocumentSelectable(ExternalDocumentServiceContext context, T doc)
      Returns true if the domain specific external document object is selectable for a field by end user.

    • Method Detail
